name: Freelancer 2018 - No Ads or Tricky Buttons x rash!
description:
An improved version of the Freelancer UI with:
- Less Ads/Banners
- Less Tricky Buttons
- No Awkward Side Bar (optional)

user.name: rash!
user.about: Engineer. Audio & Video editor. Voice over artist.

additional_info:
Style Name:         Freelancer - Improved User Interface (Rash UI)
Description:  Small theme that reduces de amount of Promos, Ads and Banners. Also reduces the Tricky Buttons that makes you pay.
